member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.ParseField.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.ParseComponent})
member.summary: ParseField Constructor: Creates a new ParseField object
member.param: The Index to set to this ParseField objects FieldIndex property
The Order to set to this ParseField objects FieldOrder property
The Repeated to set to this ParseField objects RepeatedField property
The Values to set to this ParseField objects FieldValues property

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.ParseField.CompareTo(HL7Lib.Base.ParseField)
member.summary: Sorts a list of objects in reverse FieldIndex order
member.param: The ParseField object to compare
member.returns: Returns a 1 if the first objects FieldIndex is greater than the second objects else it returns a 0

member.summary: The FieldIndex of the Field from the HL7 message

member.summary: The FieldOrder used in inserting a repeating field into an HL7 segment

member.summary: The RepeatedField used to determine if a field is a repeating field

member.summary: The FieldValues used to set the component values of this field

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Helper.RandomFirstName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets a random first name for the PID segment, used to de-identify the HL7 message
member.param: The sex in the PID segment
member.returns: Returns a randomly selected name from a list of names based on the sex of the patient

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Helper.RandomLastName
member.summary: Sets a random last name for the PID segment, used to de-identify the HL7 message.
member.returns: Returns a randomly selected name from a list of names

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Helper.RandomAddress
member.summary: Sets a random street address, used to de-identify the HL7 message.
member.returns: Returns a randomly selected street address

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Helper.RandomMRN
member.summary: Sets a random MRN for the patient, used to de-identify the HL7 message
member.returns: Returns a randomly selected MRN

member.summary: Creates an ACK from the MSH segment of the associated message
member.param: The inbound message
member.returns: The ack

member.name: T:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions
member.summary: Extension Methods

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.Get(System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.Segment},System.String)
member.summary: Pulls a specified segment from a list of segments by name.
member.param: The list of segments to search.
The segment name to pull.
member.returns: Returns the specified segment if it exists, else returns null.

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.Get(System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.Field},System.String)
member.summary: Pulls a specified Field from a list of Fields by Name
member.param: The list of fields to search
The field name to pull
member.returns: Returns the specified field if it exists, else returns null.

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.Get(System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.Component},System.String)
member.summary: Pulls a specified Component from a list of Components by Name
member.param: The list of components to search
The component name to pull
member.returns: Returns the specified component if it exists, else returns null

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.GetByID(System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.Component},System.String)
member.summary: Pulls a specified Component from a list of Components byID
member.param: The list of components to search
The component ID to pull
member.returns: Returns the specified component if it exists, else returns null

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.GetByID(HL7Lib.Base.Segment,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the specified component from a segment by the component ID
member.param: The segment
The component ID
member.returns: Returns the specified component if it exists, else returns null

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.ConvertID(System.String)
member.summary: Takes a standard Component ID and converts it to a ComponentID object
member.param: The Component ID string to convert

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.GetByID(HL7Lib.Base.Message,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a list of components from a single message by ID
member.param: The message to search
The ID of the component to pull
member.returns: Returns the list of components

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.GetByID(System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.Message},System.String)
member.summary: Pulls a list of components from a list of messages based on the ID passed in
member.param: The messages to pull from
The component ID to pull
member.returns: A list of components matching the ID passed in

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.GetByID(HL7Lib.Base.Message,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a single component from a single message by ID and with the specified value
member.param: The message to search
The ID of the component to pull
The value of the component to search for
member.returns: The component returned

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.DeIdentify(HL7Lib.Base.Message)
member.summary: Removes patient identifying information from message and replaces it with made up patient data.
member.param: The message to de-identify.
member.returns: Returns the original message without identifying information.

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.ToHL7Date(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Converts a regular date into an HL7 date string.
member.param: The date to convert.
member.returns: Returns the HL7 date string.

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.FromHL7Date(System.String)
member.summary: Converts an HL7 date string into a .Net date.
member.param: The HL7 date string to convert.
member.returns: Returns the date after conversion.

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.GetIndex(System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.Field},HL7Lib.Base.Field)
member.summary: Gets the index of the specified field within the field list
member.param: The field list to pull
The field to get the index for
member.returns: Returns the index of the specified field

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.GetIndex(System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.Component},HL7Lib.Base.Component)
member.summary: Gets the index of the specified component within the component list
member.param: The component list to pull
The component to get the index for
member.returns: Returns the index of the specified component

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Extensions.UnEscape(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Unescapes escape sequences in the HL7 segment
member.param: The string to unescape
The escape character being used
member.returns: The unescaped string

member.summary: Message Class: Constructs an HL7 message object from a string

member.summary: Empty Constructor

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Message.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an HL7 message from an HL7 message string
member.param: The HL7 message string

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Message.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the HL7 message string and creates a list of segments from it
member.param: The HL7 message string

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Message.SetFields(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the Fields of a single segment
member.param: The Segment string
The Segment name

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Message.SetSegment(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.ParseField})
member.summary: Calls one of the Parse HL7 Segment Methods based on the Segment Name
member.param: The Segment Name to Parse
The List of objects

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Message.SetSegName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the segment name of the specified segment
member.param: The segment to parse
member.returns: The segment name

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Message.ParseCustom(System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.ParseField},System.String)
member.summary: Parses a custom (Z) segment from the message string
member.param: The fields and components from the custom segment string
The segment name to use
member.returns: Returns a custom segment after processing

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Message.ParseStandard(System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.ParseField},HL7Lib.Base.Segments)
member.summary: Parses a standard segment, this is the main processing method for most segments
member.param: The fields and components from the standard segment string
The Segments enum object to use for this segment
member.returns: Returns a standard segment after processing

member.name: M:HL7Lib.Base.Message.ParseMSH(System.Collections.Generic.List{HL7Lib.Base.ParseField})
member.summary: Parses an MSH segment from the message string
member.param: The fields and components from the MSH segment string
member.returns: Returns an MSH segment after processing

member.summary: Adds a standard field and component to the specified segment
member.param: The standard field and components for the specified segment
The segment to add to

member.summary: Adds a repeated field and component to the specified segment

The segment to add to
